sorters.graphics

Class ArrayEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • sorters.graphics.ArrayEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ArrayEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    This class models a semantic event which indicates that a array-defined action occurred. This high-level event is generated by an sorter (such as a AbstractArraySorter) when the array-specific action occurs (such as state changing). The event is passed to every ArrayListener object that registered to receive such events using the sorter's AbstractArraySorter.addArrayListener(sorters.graphics.ArrayListener) method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
